inputs.name: commandScript
inputs.content:
#!/bin/bash

cd /cromwell-executions/workflow1/workflowId1/call-Task1/execution
tmpDir=$(mkdir -p "/cromwell-executions/workflow1/workflowId1/call-Task1/tmp.806bfb03" && echo "/cromwell-executions/workflow1/workflowId1/call-Task1/tmp.806bfb03")
chmod 777 "$tmpDir"
export _JAVA_OPTIONS=-Djava.io.tmpdir="$tmpDir"
export TMPDIR="$tmpDir"
export HOME="$HOME"
(
cd /cromwell-executions/workflow1/workflowId1/call-Task1/execution

)
oute2bf9eaa="${tmpDir}/out.$$" erre2bf9eaa="${tmpDir}/err.$$"
mkfifo "$oute2bf9eaa" "$erre2bf9eaa"
trap 'rm "$oute2bf9eaa" "$erre2bf9eaa"' EXIT
tee '/cromwell-executions/workflow1/workflowId1/call-Task1/execution/stdout' < "$oute2bf9eaa" &
tee '/cromwell-executions/workflow1/workflowId1/call-Task1/execution/stderr' < "$erre2bf9eaa" >&2 &
(
cd /cromwell-executions/workflow1/workflowId1/call-Task1/execution


echo "Hello World from Task1." > OutputFromTask1.vcf
)  > "$oute2bf9eaa" 2> "$erre2bf9eaa"
echo $? > /cromwell-executions/workflow1/workflowId1/call-Task1/execution/rc.tmp
(
# add a .file in every empty directory to facilitate directory delocalization on the cloud
cd /cromwell-executions/workflow1/workflowId1/call-Task1/execution
find . -type d -empty -print0 | xargs -0 -I % touch %/.file
)
(
cd /cromwell-executions/workflow1/workflowId1/call-Task1/execution
sync


)
mv /cromwell-executions/workflow1/workflowId1/call-Task1/execution/rc.tmp /cromwell-executions/workflow1/workflowId1/call-Task1/execution/rc
